description.value:
Trigger Your prey is within reach and attempts to move away from you.

Your prey can't escape. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride} up to your Speed, following the foe and keeping it in reach throughout its movement until it stops moving or you've moved your full Speed.

You can use Keep Pace to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Burrow]{Burrow}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Climb]{Climb}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Fly]{Fly}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Swim]{Swim} instead of Stride if you have the corresponding movement type.
